seller_info_text: Sold by AnkerDirect UK and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: 15W Ultra-Fast Charging: Unlock the power of high-speed 15W charging, backed by Qi2 certification. Seamlessly compatible with MagSafe, it's high-speed charging redefined.
Ultra-Compact Foldable Design: At only 6.9 oz, this wireless charging station boasts a size comparable to a deck of cards when folded and weighs less than a baseball.
Time-Saver for Time Keepers: Quickly power up your Apple Watch Series 9 to 47% in just 30 minutes thanks to the MFW certification—significantly faster than non-certified chargers.
3-in-1 Apple Charger: Charge your iPhone, AirPods, and Apple Watch simultaneously, all while enjoying the versatility of the built-in adjustable phone stand.
What You Get: Anker MagGo Wireless Charging Station (Foldable 3-in-1), 40W USB-C charger, 5 ft (1.5 m) USB-C to USB-C cable, welcome guide, 24-month warranty, and our friendly customer service.
description: Product Description Previous page Next page 1 Anker MagGo Tech 2 Device Input Power 3 Advanced AI Tech 4 Qi2 Fast Charging 5 Efficient Cooling Systems Previous page Next page 1 15W Ultra-Fast Charging 2 Made for Apple Watch 3 Wireless Earbuds Charging 4 Multiple Charging Spots Previous page Next page 1 Ultra-Portable 2 ActiveShield 2.0 3 MultiProtect 4 Qi2 Certified 5 Compatibility Is the product safe to use when it gets warm/hot? Slight warming during wireless charging is normal, especially under heavy use. The product's metal build enhances heat dissipation for efficient charging, which may result in a warmer feel. Can Anker MagGo Wireless Charging Station (Foldable 3-in-1) charge an Apple Watch Ultra? Yes, Anker MagGo Wireless Charging Station can charge Apple Watch models, including the Apple Watch Ultra. Due to Ultra's larger size, adjust the watch module's angle for a secure connection, especially if the phone charging module is not in use. Is this charging pad compatible with Android phones? Not compatible with Android. The charging pad is designed for devices with magnetic wireless charging, available only in iPhone 12 and later models. For optimal Qi2 15W charging, the device must be an iPhone 13 or newer, running on iOS 17.2 or later. Can a phone case affect wireless charging? For the best wireless charging experience, we recommend using Apple's official magnetic phone cases. You should avoid cases thicker than 2.5 mm and non-magnetic cases, as they may affect charging efficiency. Why doesn't my iPhone show the charging circle when using magnetic charging? Firstly, verify if your iPhone is a model from the 13/14/15 series, as only these models support magnetic charging. Next, ensure that your phone's operating system is updated to iOS 17.2, as this is necessary for the feature to function properly.
